PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-07012009-05-07,  ,  ,  PSEP, 
ActFirearms Act
PrecisRegulations amending the FIREARMS LICENCES REGULATIONS, enabling individuals who have an expired POSSESSION ONLY LICENCE (POL) to apply for a new POL providing they have registered non-restricted or restricted firearms. This one-year period, from May 17, 2009 to May 16, 2010, will allow these individuals to come into compliance.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0138 Publication Date: 2009-05-27
AttachmentsAttachment
